DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether mindful walk program effective treatment patient chronic low back pain .
DOC.criteria: male female , 1865 year chronic low back pain ( disease duration > 3 month ) pain intensity visual analogue scale inclusion > 40 mm ( 0100 mm scale ) pharmacological treatment NSAID treatment last 4 week undersign informed consent form active walking jogging last 6 week ( < 60 minutes/week ) regular meditation , relaxation exercise , mindfulness exercise last 6 week ( > 30 minute per week ) use complementary medicine therapy acupuncture , homeopathy , herbal medicine last 6 week plan next 12 week use nonpharmacological therapy physical therapy , manual therapy osteopathy last 4 week participation another trial within last 3 month pathological neurological symptom muscular paralysis paraesthesia due spinal disc herniation cause risk fall inability walk angina pectoris last 3 month chronic respiratory disease respiratory insufficiency intake central nervous systemacting analgesic last 6 week Known renal / hepatic disease Severe organic , psychological psychiatric disorder permit study participation apply early retirement due low back pain undersign informed consent form
